## Earnings For Fiscal Years ended 9/30

For fiscal years ended 09/30.

Results are adjusted to reflect stock splits, which occurred on 03/08/05, 03/07/06, 03/07/07, and 03/06/17.

* Q1 2018 earnings reflect a one-time, non-cash benefit to income taxes that the Company was required to record related to the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017.

† YTD 2024 represents nine months ended 06/30/24.
